last_episode_to_air.name: Welcome Bruno
last_episode_to_air.overview: After another failed attempt to bring Bruno into the local supermarket, Malcolm meets a fellow dog lover who changes his life for the better.

name: It's Bruno!
overview: An old-school Brooklyn native devotes his days to caring for his adorable dog, Bruno -- and making sure the neighbors show his pooch the proper respect.

episodes.name: Operation Turkey Meat
episodes.overview: When Malcolm runs out of the fancy turkey he feeds Bruno, his quick trip to the bodega turns into a series of increasingly hostile encounters.

episodes.name: Sh*t and Run
episodes.overview: Angry that someone in the neighborhood isn't picking up after their dog, Malcolm plays amateur sleuth to hunt down the poopetrator.

episodes.name: An Angie is Born
episodes.overview: When his nemesis's cute pup becomes a local celebrity, Malcolm seeks out advertising opportunities for Bruno.

episodes.name: Lovely Lulu
episodes.overview: Malcolm makes a love connection thanks to Bruno's irresistible cuteness, but he soon begins to wonder who she's really interested in.

episodes.name: War of the Walkers
episodes.overview: The rescue and return of a lost dog lead Malcolm to a new business opportunity -- and some vicious competition.

episodes.name: Rock Bottom
episodes.overview: A shocking encounter with his Bruno-obsessed ex sends Malcolm into an emotional and physical tailspin.

episodes.name: Ranger Danger
episodes.overview: Malcolm faces off against a dogged park ranger after she catches Bruno doing his business where he shouldn't.

episodes.name: Welcome Bruno
episodes.overview: After another failed attempt to bring Bruno into the local supermarket, Malcolm meets a fellow dog lover who changes his life for the better.
